ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
trait MyTrait1(str: String) <: Object
public proc _.printMessage(): Unit = puts str
end
trait MyTrait2(str: String) <: MyTrait1(str) end
constructor MyCtor(str: String): MyTrait2(str) end
proc main(): Unit do MyCtor('Hello World').printMessage() end
